spout

Class Spout

  • java.lang.Object
    • spout.Spout

  • public class Spout
extends Object
    Main Class to use with Processing
    Author:
    Lynn Jarvis, Martin Froehlich

    • Constructor Detail

      • Spout

        public Spout(PApplet parent)
        Create a Spout Object. A spout object is created within the JNI dll and a pointer to it saved in this class for use with all functions.
        Parameters:
        parent -

    • Method Detail

      • release

        public void release()
        Can be called from the sketch to release the library resources. Such as from an over-ride of "exit" in the sketch for Processing 3.0.2

      • dispose

        public void dispose()
        This method should be called automatically when the sketch is disposed. Differences observed between 3.0.1, which does call it for window close or esc but not for the "Stop" button, and 3.0.2 which does not call it at all. Senders are apparently released because they can't be detected subsequently.

      • createSenderName

        public void createSenderName(String name)
        Initialize a sender name. If the name is not specified, the sketch folder name is used.
        Parameters:
        name - - sender name (up to 256 characters)

      • createSender

        public boolean createSender(String name)
        Initialize a sender with the sketch window dimensions. If the sender name is not specified, the sketch folder name is used.
        Parameters:
        name - - sender name (up to 256 characters)
        Returns:
        true if the sender was created

      • createSender

        public boolean createSender(String name,
                            int Width,
                            int Height)
        Initialize a sender. The name provided is registered in the list of senders Texture share initialization only succeeds if the graphic hardware is compatible, otherwise it defaults to memoryshare mode
        Parameters:
        name - - sender name (up to 256 characters)
        Width - - sender width
        Height - - sender height
        Returns:
        true if the sender was created

      • updateSender

        public void updateSender(int Width,
                         int Height)
        Update the size of the current sender
        Parameters:
        Width - - new width
        Height - - new height

      • closeSender

        public void closeSender()
        Close the sender. This releases the sender name from the list if senders and releases all resources for the sender.

      • sendTexture

        public void sendTexture()
        Write the sketch drawing surface texture to an opengl/directx shared texture

      • sendTexture

        public void sendTexture(PGraphics pgr)
        Write the texture of a graphics object.
        Parameters:
        pgr - - the graphics object to be used.

      • sendTexture

        public void sendTexture(PImage img)
        Write the texture of an image object.
        Parameters:
        img - - the image to be used.

      • createSpoutControl

        public boolean createSpoutControl(String name,
                                  String type)
        Create a control with defaults.
        Parameters:
        name - - control name
        type - - text (string), bool (checkbox), event (button), float (value)
        Returns:
        true for success

      • createSpoutControl

        public boolean createSpoutControl(String name,
                                  String type,
                                  float value)
        Create a control with default value.
        Parameters:
        name - - control name
        type - - float, bool, event
        Returns:
        true for success

      • createSpoutControl

        public boolean createSpoutControl(String name,
                                  String type,
                                  String text)
        Create a text control with default string.
        Parameters:
        name - - control name
        type - - text
        Returns:
        true for success

      • createSpoutControl

        public boolean createSpoutControl(String name,
                                  String type,
                                  float minimum,
                                  float maximum,
                                  float value)
        Create a float control with defaults. Minimum, Maximum, Default
        Parameters:
        name - - control name
        type - - float
        Returns:
        true for success

      • openSpoutControls

        public boolean openSpoutControls(String name)
        Open SpoutControls A sender creates the controls and then calls OpenControls with a control name so that the controller can set up a memory map and share data with the sender as it changes the controls.
        Parameters:
        name - - control map name (the sender name)
        Returns:
        true for success

      • checkSpoutControls

        public int checkSpoutControls(String[] controlName,
                              int[] controlType,
                              float[] controlValue,
                              String[] controlText)
        Check the controller for changed controls. The value or text string are changed depending on the control type.
        Parameters:
        controlName -
        controlType -
        controlValue -
        controlText -
        Returns:
        The number of controls. Zero if no change.

      • openController

        public boolean openController()
        Open the SpoutController executable to allow controls to be changed. Requires SpoutControls installation or SpoutController.exe in the sketch path
        Returns:
        true if the controller was found and opened

      • closeSpoutControls

        public boolean closeSpoutControls()
        Close the link with the controller.
        Returns:
        true for success

      • createSenderMemory

        public boolean createSenderMemory(String name,
                                  int Width,
                                  int Height)
        Create a sender memory map.
        Parameters:
        name - - sender name
        Width - - map width
        Height - - map height
        Returns:
        True for success

      • updateSenderMemorySize

        public boolean updateSenderMemorySize(String name,
                                      int Width,
                                      int Height)
        Change the size of a sender memory map.
        Parameters:
        name - Sender name
        Width - - new map width
        Height - - new map height
        Returns:
        True for success

      • writeSenderString

        public boolean writeSenderString(String sValue)
        Write a string to the memory map. The map size must be sufficient for the string.
        Parameters:
        sValue - - string to be written
        Returns:
        True for success

      • closeSenderMemory

        public void closeSenderMemory()
        Close a sender memory map.

      • lockSenderMemory

        public long lockSenderMemory()
        Lock a memory map for write or read access.
        Returns:
        Size of the memory map

      • unlockSenderMemory

        public void unlockSenderMemory()
        Unlock a memory map after locking.

      • createReceiver

        public boolean createReceiver(String name)
        Initialize a Receiver. If the named sender is not running or if the name is not specified, the receiver will attempt to connect with the active sender. If the sender is found, the name is returned and set.
        Parameters:
        name - - sender name to be used (optional)
        Returns:
        true if connection with a sender succeeded

      • closeReceiver

        public void closeReceiver()
        Close a receiver. All resources of the receiver are released.

      • receiveTexture

        public boolean receiveTexture()
        Receive into a local graphics object and draw it directly.
        Returns:
        true if a texture was received.

      • receiveTexture

        public PGraphics receiveTexture(PGraphics pg)
        Receive into graphics. Sender changes are detected in JNISpout.ReceiveTexture and returned. The PGraphics is resized the next time.
        Parameters:
        pg - - the graphics to be used and returned
        Returns:
        true if a texture was returned

      • receiveTexture

        public PImage receiveTexture(PImage img)
        Receive into an image texture.
        Parameters:
        img - - the image to be used and returned
        Returns:
        true if a texture was returned

      • receivePixels

        public PImage receivePixels(PImage img)
        Receive into image pixels.
        Parameters:
        img - - the image to be used and returned
        Returns:
        true if pixels were returned

      • selectSender

        public void selectSender()
        Pop up SpoutPanel to select a sender. If the user selected a different one, attach to it. Requires Spout installation 2.004 or higher.

      • resizeFrame

        public void resizeFrame()
        Resize the receiver drawing surface and sketch window to that of the sender Requires Processing 3. Optional.

      • setInvert

        public void setInvert(boolean bInvert)
        User option to set texture inversion for send and receive
        Parameters:
        bInvert - - true or false as required

      • spoutReport

        public void spoutReport(boolean bInit)
        Print current settings to the console.
        Parameters:
        bInit - - the initialization mode

      • infoBox

        public void infoBox(String infoMessage)
        Pop up a MessageBox dialog
        Parameters:
        infoMessage - - the message to show
